items.title: US Navy admiral ordered second  deadly Venezuela boat strike, White House says
items.description: The strikes, authorised by Defence Secretary Pete Hegseth, have raised fresh legality questions - but the White House says laws have been followed.

items.title: Hadjar promoted and British teenager Lindblad gets F1 drive
items.description: Red Bull will promote Isack Hadjar to their senior team and hand Briton Arvid Lindblad, 18, a debut Formula 1 season in 2026.

items.title: Quarter of police forces lack basic policies on sexual offences, Sarah Everard inquiry finds
items.description: The report, four years after the 33-year-old's murder, says urgent action is needed to prevent violent, sexual attacks against women.
